diff_hunk:
@@ -56,6 +70,7 @@ def __init__(self):
         self._forward_pre_hooks = OrderedDict()
         self._modules = OrderedDict()

body: Unpickling will still work, but the `name_` attribute won't be present, so the code will fail. I'm adding a condition to `__setstate__` to Module so that the field will still exist after unpickling an old pickle. I don't think we need to touch `__getstate__`, but I may be missing something.
body_html: Unpickling will still work, but the name_ attribute won't be present, so the code will fail. I'm adding a condition to __setstate__ to Module so that the field will still exist after unpickling an old pickle. I don't think we need to touch __getstate__, but I may be missing something.
body_text: Unpickling will still work, but the name_ attribute won't be present, so the code will fail. I'm adding a condition to __setstate__ to Module so that the field will still exist after unpickling an old pickle. I don't think we need to touch __getstate__, but I may be missing something.
